title: DLSA Thoothukudi Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 37 Para Legal Volunteer Posts
description: The District Legal Service Authority (DLSA) Thoothukudi has announced the notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 37 Para Legal Volunteers Jobs. Those candidates who have completed their 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, application fee, education details, and how to apply for the DLSA Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible aspirants can apply on or before the last date of Application....
